website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for customers who want a high-quality rain boot that's easy to put on and take off paws.
pros: Top-quality fabric lasts for years with its wear-resistant construction
Nylon buckles stay in place, keeping your pet's paws secure
cons: Not the best option for smaller dogs

customer_reviews.title: Protect their paws
customer_reviews.text: Take a video the first time you use these, it’s very funny! My dog loves to run and chase balls but when we travel she tears up the bottom of her feet. These were perfect for protecting her feet. Once I got them on properly she got used to them quickly and didn’t mind having them. I watched a video about using them and found that I wasn’t pulling them up high enough at first. recently my dog injured her paw and I used these to cover her paw so she couldn’t lick it constantly and that was great! She healed fast.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Protects paws that drag
customer_reviews.text: My dog was recently diagnosed with Degenerative Myelopathy (DM) which causes him to drag his feet and his nails would bleed from the contact of his nails on the concrete. These boots help protect his paws and, along with a wheelchair, we're able to go on long walks with no problems. They started to ware out in the toe after 4 months, but I would expect if I dragged my tennis shoes every time I walked in them they would ware out relatively fast as well. I still think they're worth the money. If your dog has no problems with the way they walk I'm sure they'll last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my bulldog starts chewing on is back paws after we take a walk. I'm positive he has allergies so I figured these would help. It took my wife and I to get them on his paws the first time. Of course the front ones he took right off. I walked him with just the boots on his back paws. It doesn't matter how I adjust these they keep coming off his paws as we walk. He lets me put them on now and walks with them, but they just keep coming off. Pretty frustrating and a waste of money. I did measure his paws to make sure I got the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I just got these for my 12 yr old Beautiful Boykin. So I can’t speak to durability. It took him a few minutes to adjust to them and then he flung one off while out but I put it bk on correctly and that little man took off running. He seemed to have more energy. I felt so positive about them that I ordered a 2nd pair for my other beautiful Boykin boy. I will update this post when it snows.
customer_reviews.author: maria H

customer_reviews.title: Smaller pawed dogs are perfect for these!
customer_reviews.text: If they fit on and stay on your dogs feet, theyre actually a 5 if not 10 star product! My GSD has VERY big paws and long "ankles". So they woukdnt stay on and didnt work for us. Otherwise he seemed comfortable until they cane off. He didnt walk funny for more than a minute and could even trot in them. Didnt tey to bite at them or "nose" them off. So they likely arent uncomfortable and the materials theyre made with appears durable.
customer_reviews.author: k9882

customer_reviews.title: They work, but they take longer than you think to put on and Large isn't super secure
customer_reviews.text: I like them, however, depending on the size you get the velcro straps are different, the larger size appears to always have a bit hanging off that the dogs and chew on and get the shoe loose enough to get out of. I really like these if it's a rainy day and you don't want to deal with as big of a wet mess as it would be with bare paws. Once you get them on, you'll want to leave them on for awhile cause it's a pain to take on and off for two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Usakiia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product, but unfortunately even the smallest pair was still just a tad too big for our Border Collie/Jack Russell mix 27 lb dog. I'd love to return them, as I've already bought new ones, but alas my Husband isn't able to find where he put them!! Layla would wear them for about 3 steps and then they'd begin flying where she just kicked them off!!
customer_reviews.author: laylabug

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought my dog would not like these but he has actually enjoyed them. They fit great for a German Shepherd Dog and I got the XL size. They look super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Veliz

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large bullmastiff. His hips are completely shot. We also have hardwood floors and he’s unable to walk on them (in fact he refuses). We needed something to help him simply walk again. I tried some socks, they did great, but didn’t hold up very long, so I wanted to move to boots/shoes. These have been great. Light-weight and easy to put on. He doesn’t walk any different and is beyond thankful to wear them. Definitely give them a try. Now, how long the Velcro holds up is the only concern. He will be wearing these from sun up to sun down. We shall see...
customer_reviews.author: Randi P.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for XL dog (70 lbs)
customer_reviews.text: the boots are good quality and hold up well, but almost every single time I put them on my dog, he returns to the door missing at least 1 or 2 of them. I velcro them as tightly as they can possibly get, but they still come off. I think for taller dogs, they really should be a lot taller boot. perhaps they'd work fine for very small dogs with short legs.
customer_reviews.author: jlt

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to put on, but my dog does not seem to like them very much. She walks a little funny at first, but quickly gets the hang of them. They are perfect for keeping her as clean as possible & keeping her paws from feeling too hot during these summer days. Only con would be that she somehow realized how to take the Velcro off & she can then loosen them. Definitely keep an eye on them while wearing these
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Made it possible to take my dog on 14er hikes
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the 14ers in Colorado have very sharp rocky areas that prevented me from bringing my dog before. These solved that issue and have made our hikes so much more fun. They only fell off of one foot one time which was pretty good considering the terrain we were covering.
customer_reviews.author: Willfargo

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery food quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Great product. The shoes do not stay on too well although they are very snug on our 20lb waltepoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons favorite customer

customer_reviews.title: These stayed on her great! I got them because she was getting burnt ...
customer_reviews.text: These stayed on her great! I got them because she was getting burnt pads from the asphalt, and we are going camping in a few weeks. So cute and they look very durable :)
customer_reviews.author: Dmoney

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on feet
customer_reviews.text: I got his for my GSD puppy as it hurt his feet. We put them on all the 4feet and looked comfortable. However after the dog walks for couple of steps either boot will slip out of the feet or twist upside down with sole pointing up. I think the problem is with the length of the boot. Width fits correct not the length as a result it keep slipping out making it very shaggy when it walk. I am going to try out for another day to see if there is better way to put it. Otherwise it is not suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: My fur baby is happy,  I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: It took my fur baby a bit to get use to but they are great. He bit on them at first but quickly learned that they would not come off if he did. That’s a big plus for us. They are a great quality product to protect his paws from the hot summer asphalt and sidewalks. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nacard81

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Works good for hardwood floors, they don't slide like the paws do. The major problem for me was they flip around if the dog drags their paws any (wobblers) and if the velcro isn't exactly where it is supposed to be, they catch on throw rugs causing them just to flip if you're lucky, most of the time they pull off. On a dog that doesn't have wobblers, they may work a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: MarunaZ

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and havent pur many miles on them yet but the reflection is great and they seem fairly durably made. Mostly got them for downtown living, broken glass etc. After about 15 min shes already forgot they're there.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin sommers

customer_reviews.title: Great dog shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, so long as you get the right size/fit. They're especially good for rough terrain that would be difficult for a bare paw to navigate like in the woods or across wetness like a creek.
customer_reviews.author: yogadog

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots/good value
customer_reviews.text: Great little boots for the price. My dog did need time to adjust but now she walks with them on without any problems. Make sure to snug them up so they stay on. We lost one on the 1st walk but found it. Now we know how tight to make them so they stay on and are comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: EllaC

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because my lab chews her feet uncontrollably. She was really doing damage to her feet. I thought I would try these before trying the medication the vet said was available. They work great for our needs. She can't chew her feet. Her feet are healing. And she doesn't try to chew the shoes. I take them off for walks because they are a little clumsy (I think I bought too large a size). So I don't know how well they wear outside, but after a week of inside wear, they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, keeps paws clean
customer_reviews.text: we've gone through a handful of these type boots in the past few years. they work really well, but don't hold up well to machine washing, hence the handful we've gone through. i wish they were a bit more durable for washing since they do get stinky pretty quickly if enough walks through rain/snow are taken.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Water prof also !
customer_reviews.text: This product it’s perfect for my dog ! She love it ! For heat or could totally recommendable!!
customer_reviews.author: dayana sander

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I got the smallest size and they were WAY too big. I even measured her foot and it was perfect according to the measurements. However, I would get it as tight as it would go and it would still slip off her feet as she walked. These look super useful, but I wished it would have worked out better in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Goodyear

customer_reviews.title: GGR Pet Boots 4 Pcs Outdoor Waterproof and Wearproof Shoes for Dogs (5# (2.7''X2.2''), Black)
customer_reviews.text: Go on easily and my Fur kids don`t seem to mind them at all . I`m assuming they must be comfortable to them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great to keep dogs feet clean and dry
customer_reviews.text: When it rains and there is mud outside I put these on my boxer dog before we take a walk. These keep his feet clean and dry so he doesn't track that inside the house. Love these little booties!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sorentino

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Fell off dogs feet as soon as he started walking.
customer_reviews.author: JackMc

customer_reviews.title: Not just for weather!
customer_reviews.text: Our Lab constantly chews at the pads of his paws till they are open and raw. While we are trying to figure out why, I was trying to think out of the box on how to keep his paws bandaged. These work brilliantly. I use Neosporin and then self adhesive tape, put one of sons little socks on, then the boot. Voila!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: These shoes can make awful things to your dog legs
customer_reviews.text: I but it for my dog, he is a big dog so he need to travel a lot. I put twice the shoes on his legs... and he just began to limp.. and it appear the shoes make his toenail was broken due to the use of these shoes... button line, I don't recommend to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It def works!!
customer_reviews.text: My lab had 2 ACL surgeries, so she now wears these lil boots. They help so she dosent slide on the wood floors. They def help.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Flip over
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble keeping these on my dog. I can't seem to get the strap right enough and the shoe flips over while she's walking so the sole is in top of her paw. When I can get the strap well enough then they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have to have boots for the hot pavement here in Texas. These are good quality, nothing coming loose yet. One or two will turn with hard running, but honestly I think all boots do that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Started ripping
customer_reviews.text: in under 6 miles on the road these had a hole through the side of one. Still using them and we are at about 16 miles total so far. Used on an 8 month old Malinois.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Z. Lipari

customer_reviews.title: Dogs hate them but I think they look great
customer_reviews.text: The dogs have to wear them on hot days so they dont burn their paws, no matter how funny it makes them walk lol
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. Look good
customer_reviews.text: Dog doesn’t like them. I think he still needs to get used to them. I’m not sure. Look cute and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Clara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Union Rich Pet Boots 4 Pcs Outdoor Waterproof and Wearproof Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My Lab took to them right away. They are light weight and seem to be made from some breathable materials so my Pups feet don't get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our dog to wear on lake dock during hot and cold months but she didn’t like them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job! Doesn’t fall off
customer_reviews.text: These are made very well and fit perfect and easy to put on and off. Our dogs walk in them great. We have two Boston terriers and one beaglier. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: RRG

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great! After receiving them today
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great! After receiving them today, I put them on my dog and they fit perfectly! They are comfy and they protect her feet and allow her run freely!
customer_reviews.author: Xiaohua Cao

customer_reviews.title: Durable and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Writing a review after using this product for 2 years and it's still being used and does a fantastic job! At first my dog was like "nope" but he quickly got used it and can run, jump, and clobber through the muddy grass like a pro. They are definitely water-proof and durable. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase very happy! GSD approved
customer_reviews.text: We just got them today and so far so good! He let me put them on him with no issues. He did the high step for a bit but then he got comfortable with them. Extremely happy with these!! Hes a 3 year old GSD 90 pounds and ordered him an 8 and they fit perfect. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Sizes off
customer_reviews.text: The sizes don’t match the description so after buying two different pairs trying to get the right size I said eff it and returned them.won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy- damage to paw pads
customer_reviews.text: Not happy about these! We were very excited to receive these seeing as my dog loves going for long runs. She only was out for a short run, the very FIRST time she wore them and they severely irritated her in between her paw pads and caused her paw pads to crack.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Shoes worst than asphalt
customer_reviews.text: Been running my dog for over a month on my bike before using these running dog shoes. Her paws didn't look bad but needed to protect them. These shoes rubbed my baby's paws raw and the fronts paws were bleeding first 1/2 mile. Research and spend the money needed to protect your dogs paws.
customer_reviews.author: luis chapa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on his foot
customer_reviews.text: I got size 5 for my Australian cattle dog. And I thought it would be big for him But I don’t know. It seems Very small. Like it comes off very easily. It doesn’t wrap around his foot/ankle all the way for his comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Alohayala

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Although I am returning these because they were too big for my 5lb porkie, I would buy if they had a size 2.
customer_reviews.author: Betty M.

customer_reviews.title: They’re fine, work for protecting his paws from the hot ...
customer_reviews.text: They’re fine, work for protecting his paws from the hot pavement. He’s able to kick them off though, especially if he starts running.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots have made a difference in our lives. This spring has been the wettest and muddiest in our recollection. These take a bit to put on, but they stay on and work! Also, she can't dig when she wears them. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: I love them: they stay on the feet
customer_reviews.text: I love them: they stay on the feet, provides traction on loose and rough terrain. My dog, however, doesn't love them on carpet or tile.
customer_reviews.author: Tweeter

customer_reviews.title: Go a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I measured my pups feet exactly as told and they were still too small.
customer_reviews.author: JenniNoona

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Boots
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Have not yet put them into action but can tell they will be effective in keeping feet clean and protected!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Even though I used measurements, these were too small for my lab. I gave them to a friend. They are very well made and nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Decent boots
customer_reviews.text: My dog has skinny ankles so I have to wrap the straps around his legs a couple times but the boots do what I need otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia C. Meidenbauer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put on and my dog had difficulty walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but doesn’t work on a lab
customer_reviews.text: It does not stay on my dogs paws when she runs. When she walks the shoes twist around and my dog refuses to walk in them
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Good service, disappointed in product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed but the customer service was great. Let's just say that my dogs feet suffered a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn't like boots
customer_reviews.text: Dog chewed them off his feet. Wanted something to make him quit digging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes to protect Gordy's paws from getting raw in cold weather. They don't twist as much as other brands I have tried, but stay in place well
customer_reviews.author: Snoz

customer_reviews.title: Not so durable and we only walk 2miles the last three times my dog wore them
customer_reviews.text: They are already breaking and only been used 3 times 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a life saver... really a foot saver! We have bad grass burs this year and these shoes are protecting my dogs feet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dldj2013

customer_reviews.title: They stayed on!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t talk about comfort as my dog didn’t mention anything lol. They stayed on! and were very durable. Will be getting my other dog a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Manny Arciniega

customer_reviews.title: Stiff not flexible
customer_reviews.text: Boots were stiff and no matter how tight I made them my 80lb dog was able to kick them off. Not very flexible and had a hard time walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: sarah thao

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We live where there are a lot of stickers. These protect her feet. She likes them.
customer_reviews.author: DianaPowers

customer_reviews.title: I need to do more research
customer_reviews.text: The product seems great but I'll need to look up more videos to get my puppy use to the idea currently its not his favorite thing
customer_reviews.author: Howard Flowers

customer_reviews.title: These are not good
customer_reviews.text: The straps are too stretchy. They fall off when swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and stay on
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to put on and they stay on well. The dogs are still getting used to them but I can tell they really don't mind. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lakewood, CO

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Size was too big for my puppy so I gave them to my co-worker.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my dog. Tried twice and he got them off or walked out of them. I measured his paw before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Our border collie was injured by the neighbors and had bloody paws. These would not stay on at all. The plastic IV bags w gauze ribbon stayed on, but not these. I wanted to return them, but can't now. We were so busy w his care, time got away.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: No matter how tight I made them they would come ...
customer_reviews.text: No matter how tight I made them they would come off my collies feet. Had to give it a shot though.
customer_reviews.author: DosGoat

customer_reviews.title: Fit was not bad but velcro caused issues
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were gonna be perfect since it had 2 straps and would help hold on my dogs paw better. I have a golden doodle with VERY furry paws so its difficult to get shoes to stay. The big issue with these ended up being the Velcro (sticky) part is on the boot and so the strap did not cover it all causing the dog to stick to everything including carpet that would either trip him or pull off the boot. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Benz

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality but a bit too short and ran a ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality but a bit too short and ran a bit small for my dogs. (I measured their paws before ordering.)

product_meta.title: GGR Pet Boots 4 Pcs Outdoor Waterproof and Wearproof Running Shoes for Dogs Pet Rain Boots
feature_bullets: SECURE ：Protect your dog's paws from being hurt. Our products are waterproof, anti-skidding and wear-resistant.
CONVENIENT： You don't have to wash your pets' paws every day to keep them clean.
QUALITY: Fixed by nylon buckles, easy to wear and take off. All these will give your beloved dog a comfortable feeling.

FASHION AND COOL:This pair of pet shoes will allow your dog stands out among the dogs.If you are not satisfied with the product, we provide a 100% refund or return service for you. You can buy our product with good confidence.
SIZING:It can be used for medium to large dogs like Japanese Akits, shepherd dogs, labradors, large golden retrievers, etc.Size reference: 2.7"*2.2"(l*w) for 40-55 lbs.
